text:
A Bureau of Delinquent Revenue Collection is hereby established, the operations of which shall be under the direction and control of the Tax Collector.
(Bill No. 662, Ord. No. 9.0231(C.S.), Sec. 1)

heading.catch_text: ESTABLISHED; TO BE UNDER DIRECTION OF TAX COLLECTOR.

chapter.text: FINANCE, TAXATION, AND OTHER FISCAL MATTERS
